thread.title: Ivanti President and CEO Steve Daly Named Utah Business 2018 CEO of the Year, Large Tech Company

author: cnbc.com
title: Ivanti President and CEO Steve Daly Named Utah Business 2018 CEO of the Year, Large Tech Company
text:
SALT LAKE CITY, Ivanti , the company that unifies IT to better manage and secure the digital workplace, today announced that its president and CEO, Steve Daly, has been named 2018 CEO of the Year, Large Tech Company by Utah Business. The award was presented during the Utah Business CEO of the Year Awards event at The Grand American Hotel on March 15.
"The Utah Business CEO of the Year program honors chief executive officers in Utah companies who are strategic visionaries, inspirational leaders, savvy businesspeople and, above all, drivers of success," said Heather Stewart, Managing Editor, Utah Business. "Steve exemplifies these traits and has led Ivanti to an impressive standing among large, innovative technology companies, worldwide."
In 2017, Daly oversaw the formation of Ivanti which was the culmination of a half-decade of growth and the successful integration of six innovative technology companies. The new Ivanti brand was launched following the merger of Landesk and Heat Software in January 2017.
Under Daly's guidance, Ivanti has doubled in size – in terms of employees, financials, solutions and customers. This can be attributed to both organic and non-organic growth strategies which have enhanced the Ivanti portfolio of solutions to unify IT and security operations for the digital workplace. Today, the company has employees in 23 countries serving over 25,000 broadly diversified customers across all industries.
"It's an honor to be recognized by Utah Business among such a distinct list of Utah CEOs and the impressive companies they lead," said Daly. "It's one more demonstration that Utah is a compelling location for building and growing leading companies, attracting top talent, nurturing happy employees and providing the vibrant community that fuels business success."
Utah Business' 2018 CEO of the Year program highlights executives in 12 size/industry categories, recognizing the individuals who embrace innovation and develop sound business strategies to propel their organizations forward. For more information, visit https://utahbusiness.com/2018-ceo-of-the-year .
Ivanti: The Power of Unified IT.
Ivanti unifies IT and Security Operations to better manage and secure the digital workplace. From PCs to mobile devices, VDI and the data center, Ivanti discovers IT assets on-premises and in the cloud, improves IT service delivery, and reduces risk with insights and automation. The company also helps organizations leverage modern technology in the warehouse and across the supply chain to improve delivery without modifying backend systems. Ivanti is headquartered in Salt Lake City, Utah, and has offices all over the world. For more information, visit www.ivanti.com and follow @GoIvanti.
About Utah Business
Utah Business ( www.utahbusiness.com ) is Utah's leading statewide source for business news and information in both print and digital formats. Utah Business also recognizes leaders across all industries through a variety of premiere award events.
